# Compiled Object files
*.o
*.obj
*.exe
*.dll
*.so
*.dylib
*.out

# Precompiled Headers
*.gch
*.pch

# Qt-specific files that should not be uploaded
*.user
*.pro.user
*.pro.user.*
*.qbs.user
*.qbs.user.*
*.qbs.shared
*.qbs.shared.*
*.qmake.stash
*.qmake.cache

# Qt Creator generated files
*.autosave

# Generated files by Qt
moc_*.cpp
ui_*.h
qrc_*.cpp

# Qt's Debugging files
*.qmlc
*.jsc

# Build folders (variable per build configuration)
build/
debug/
release/
Makefile*
*-build-desktop/

# Ignore CMake generated directories
cmake-build-*/

# Other files to ignore
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
